# Solution for Strings Exercise

# Task: Work with string methods

def upcase_string(text)
  text.upcase
end

def downcase_string(text)
  text.downcase
end

def reverse_string(text)
  text.reverse
end

def get_length(text)
  text.length
end
explanation:
This solution demonstrates common string operations:

1. **upcase/downcase**: Change case of strings

2. **reverse**: Reverse the character order

3. **length**: Get the number of characters
